app.title: SGEX Workbench
app.subtitle: WHO SMART Guidelines Exchange
app.description: A browser-based, standards-compliant collaborative editor for WHO SMART Guidelines Digital Adaptation Kits (DAKs).

landing.description: A browser-based, standards-compliant collaborative editor for WHO SMART Guidelines Digital Adaptation Kits (DAKs).
landing.connect_github: Connect your GitHub account to get started:
landing.demo_note: Demo mode showcases the enhanced DAK scanning display with mock data.
landing.need_help: Need help getting started? Check out our comprehensive
landing.learn_more: to learn more about SGEX Workbench and DAK components.
landing.choose_profile: Choose the GitHub profile or organization containing your DAK repositories:

errors.failed_fetch_user: Failed to fetch user data. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.github_auth_required: GitHub authentication required. Please authenticate first.
errors.user_not_found: Could not access the requested DAK. User '{{user}}' not found or not accessible.
errors.repo_not_found: Could not access the requested DAK. Repository '{{user}}/{{repo}}' not found or not accessible.
errors.generic_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
